name: Cyberpong
description: Cyberpong is a fast-paced, action-packed game that combines elements of soccer and pong. The goal is to score points by getting the ball past your opponent's goalkeeper.

rules.description: You face off against the computer or local/remote players in one-on-one matches. The first player to reach 5 points wins the match.
The soccer ball bounces off a slowly moving goalkeeper, so you'll need to anticipate its trajectory to make saves, using the arrow keys.
Organize your own tournaments, whether with friends in person or online. Challenge players near and far!

name: Cybertrap
description: Cybertrap is a strategic card game that combines elements of poker and war. The goal is to avoid collecting trap cards while collecting as many cards as possible.

rules.description: You face off against the computer or local/remote players in one-on-one matches. The first player to reach 3 points wins the match.
Each player receives half of a shuffled deck. The game is played with standard playing cards, and the goal is to avoid collecting trap cards.
Players simultaneously reveal their top cards. The higher card wins, and the winner takes both cards. Aces are highest, 2s are lowest.
